animeTitle: I Never Take Action And Become a Big Shot on the Heavenly Ranking
otherNames: I Never Take Action And Become a Big Shot on the Heavenly Ranking, Without Making a Move I Became the No.1 Master, Chưa Từng Xuất Thủ Ta Lăn Lộn Thành Thiên Bảng Đại Lão, Cong Bu Chushou De Wo Huncheng Tian Bang Da Lao, Cóng Bù Chūshǒu De Wǒ Hǔnchéng Tiān
synopsis: Pay attention, this man's name is A-wei! He thought he had transgressed into the body of the [Number One Villain] in the martial world, but he actually turned out to be a super weakling with a combat strength of Zero! A-wei, who fancied himself a wolf but was more like a husky, advanced by leveraging his extraordinary confidence to cut through challenges effortlessly. Concealing his identity, building his power base, reclaiming his former beautiful subordinates, and training his cute and clever apprentice... did he really become the [Number One] in the martial world?!
